FuncInfo.Name: GetValueNumber
FuncInfo.Body: Function GetValueNumber(GroupOne,GroupTwo,GroupThree) If (GroupOne = 1 And GroupTwo = 0 And GroupThree = 0) Then GetValueNumber = "1" ElseIf (GroupOne = 0 And GroupTwo = 1 And GroupThree = 0) Then GetValueNumber = "2" ElseIf (GroupOne = 0 And GroupTwo = 0 And GroupThree = 1) Then GetValueNumber = "3" Else GetValueNumber = "0" End If End Function

FuncInfo.Name: GetFourNumber
FuncInfo.Body: Function GetFourNumber(GroupOne,GroupTwo,GroupThree,GroupFour) if (GroupOne =1 and GroupTwo = 0 and GroupThree = 0 and GroupFour=0)then GetFourNumber = "1" elseif (GroupOne = 0 and GroupTwo =1 and GroupThree = 0 and GroupFour = 0 )then GetFourNumber = "2" elseif (GroupOne = 0 and GroupTwo = 0 and GroupThree =1 and GroupFour = 0)then GetFourNumber = "3" elseif (GroupOne = 0 and GroupTwo = 0 and GroupThree = 0 and GroupFour = 1)then GetFourNumber = "4" else GetFourNumber = "0" end if End Function
